resources.string: This application is actually a sample application for the new Android programming language, \'Kotlin\'.\nThe source code for this application is fully available on Github.\nYou can access it from my github developer page, or by clicking the button below to copy the direct link.

I am a French student in engineering school, passionate about Android programming.
I developed this application to explore all the basic functionality of an application with 'Kotlin'.
I think this will be the main programming language for Android in the coming years.
Please contact me if you have any comments, ideas for improvements or problems with the application, or if you'd like to get in touch with me.
